maintenance.title: Dashboard database upgrade
maintenance.description: We'll be upgrading our dashboard database which will cause it to be offline for a few minutes. Only the dashboard will be affected by this downtime. All image processing services will continue to operate uninterrupted.

incidents.title: Missing receipts in dashboard
incidents.description: Some recent receipts were missing from the Billing page of the dashboard. All receipts are now available for download. There were no issues delivering receipts by email.
